text:
@realDonaldTrump You are pathetic. Weak minded, whiney & pathetic. Repeated lies are still lies. You really don’t like police, especially when they investigate you. You’re really gonna be pissed when you’re indicted and your assets are seized and frozen. 
(And COVID-19 is still rampant) 115,000
